if you want the windows xp sounds turned on then click the start button the control panel then tweak UI and there click on General then mark the " beep on errors" box

When trying to install with parallels and selecting Windows XP in the menu - it just says file not found :( -- If choosing Windows 98, it just hangs.

Any ideas?

Oh, what I've done is ctrl+c or something out of the menu, then ran dir to see all the files available and say XP.BIN there, so tried run XP.BIN and it's in the middle of the installation already - hope this helps anyone trying to install this using parallels desktop.
Small correction, you press "q" to get out of the easy boot thingy, then you execute "run XP.BIN" and voila.
